Relic Description: Increased Maximum HP
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 1.1x

Relic Description: Increased Maximum FP
Effect: Increases maximum FP by 1.15x

Relic Description: Increased Maximum Stamina
Effect: Increases maximum stamina by 1.12x

Relic Description: [Item] in possession at start of expedition
Effect: Starts the game with the specified item
Notes: Lists contains all crystal tears and perfume items

Relic Description: Max HP increased for each great enemy defeated at a Great Church
Effect: Increases maximum HP by 1.05x for each boss killed at a great church

Relic Description: Runes and Item Discovery increased for each great enemy defeated at a Fort
Effect: Increases discovery by 16 and rune gain by 1.055x for each boss killed at a fort

Relic Description: Arcane increased for each great enemy defeated at a Ruin
Effect: Increases arcane by 4 for each boss killed at a ruin

Relic Description: Max stamina increased for each great enemy defeated at a Great Encampment
Effect: Increases maximum stamina by 1.075x for each boss killed at a camp

Relic Description: Dormant Power Helps Discover [Weapon Class]
Effect: Changes the preferred weapon class to the specified class, making it more likely to obtain it
Notes: Priority is given to first one in order. Does not stack with character's preferred weapon type

Relic Description: Physical Attack Up +3/4
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.105x / 1.12x

Relic Description: [Element] Attack Up +3/4
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy damage by 1.105x/1.12x

Relic Description: Improved Affinity Attack Power +0/1/2
Effect: Increases magic, fire, lightning, and holy damage by 1.05x/1.08x/1.1x

Relic Description: Physical attack power increases after using grease items +1/2
Effect: Increases physical damage by 1.17x/1.2x for 30 seconds after using grease

Relic Description: Attack power up when facing poison/scarlet rot/frostbite-afflicted enemy +1/2
Effect: Increases damage by 1.16x/1.2x when attacking an enemy suffering from the specified status

Relic Description: Sleep/Madness in Vicinity Improves Attack Power +0/+1
Effect: Increases damage by 1.12x/1.22x after sleep/madness procs

Relic Description: Improved Guard Counters +1/2
Effect: Increases guard counter damage by 1.25x/1.29x

Relic Description: Improved [Consumable] Damage +1/2
Effect: Increases pot/knife/stone/perfume damage by 1.3x/1.35x

Relic Description: Art gauge charged from successful guarding +1
Effect: Increases characterSkillGauge by 1.5 upon blocking an attack

Relic Description: Art gauge fills moderately upon critical hit +1
Effect: Increases characterSkillGauge by 6.5 upon riposte

Relic Description: Defeating enemies fills more of the Art gauge +1
Effect: Increases characterSkillGauge by 6.5 upon killing enemies

Relic Description: Improved Sorceries/Incantations +0/1/2
Effect: Increases sorcery/incant damage by 1.05x/1.085x/1.1x

Relic Description: Reduced FP Consumption +0/1/2
Effect: Reduces FP consumption by 0.92x/0.87x/0.84x
Notes: Higher tier (+1/2) does not seem to appear on random relics

Relic Description: Improved Physical Damage Negation +1/2
Effect: Increases physical damage negation by 10.5%/12%

Relic Description: Improved [Element] Damage Negation +1/2
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy damage negation by 15%/16%

Relic Description: Improved Affinity Damage Negation +0/1/2
Effect: Increases magic, fire, lightning, and holy damage negation by 6/10.5/12%

Relic Description: Improved [Status] Resistance +1/2
Effect: Increases specified status resistance by 110/130

Relic Description: Partial HP Restoration upon Post-Damage Attacks +1/2
Effect: Same as original, but increases HP gained per hit by 25%/35%
Notes: +1 stacks with +2, but neither stack with +0

Relic Description: HP Restoration upon Thrusting Counterattack +1
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.033] on counterhits

Relic Description: HP restored when using medicinal boluses, etc. +1
Effect: Replenish 80 HP from certain consumables

Relic Description: Improved Flask HP Restoration
Effect: Increases HP gained from flasks by 1.1x

Relic Description: [Wylder] Character Skill inflicts Blood Loss
Effect: Skill inflicts 60 (impact) / 55 (pull) bleed on hit

Relic Description: [Guardian] Character Skill Boosts Damage Negation of Nearby Allies
Effect: Increases damage negation for self and allies by 12% for 30 seconds after using skill

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Character Skill Inflicts Heavy Poison Damage on Poisoned Enemies
Effect: Skill inflicts 70 poison. Deals [MaxHP * 0.0025] + 250 damage on poison-afflicted enemies
Notes: Testing suggests its still based on max HP

Relic Description: [Duchess] Use Character Skill for Brief Invulnerability
Effect: Makes you immune to damage for 0.4 seconds after using skill

Relic Description: [Raider] Hit With Character Skill to Reduce Enemy Attack Power
Effect: Decreases enemy damage dealt by 0.87x after hitting them with skill for 13 seconds

Relic Description: [Revenant] Increases Max FP upon Ability Activation
Effect:
Permanently increases maximum FP by 1.0075x from 0 to 20 stacks
Permanently increases maximum FP by 1.0085x from 21 to 40 stacks
Permanently increases maximum FP by 1.0095x from 41 to 60 stacks (cap, total 51% increased max FP)

Relic Description: [Recluse] Collect Affinity Residues to Negate Affinity
Effect: Increases magic/fire/lightning/holy damage negation by 20% upon absorbing respective residue for 30 seconds

Relic Description: [Executor] Slowly Restore HP upon Ability Activation
Effect: Restores [MaxHP * 0.0027] + 3 for 30 seconds after passive activates (recovering from status effect)

Relic Description: [Scholar] Reduced FP consumption when using Character Skill on self
Effect: Reduces FP consumption by 0.85x for 40 seconds after using character skill self buff

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Executing Art readies Character Skill
Effect: Allows you to perform Trance immediately after activating ultimate. Works with temporary ultimate use.

Relic Description: [Wylder] Improved Mind, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 5, increases mind by 10
Notes: Stat changes assumes level 15 (same applies to the effects below); -100 HP, +50 FP

Relic Description: [Wylder] Improved Intelligence and Faith, Reduced Strength and Dexterity
Effect: Decreases strength by 7 and dexterity by 5, increases intelligence and faith by 15

Relic Description: [Guardian] Improved Strength and Dexterity, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 8, increases strength by 9 and dexterity by 19
Notes: ~16% AP increase for halberds, ~20% increase for heavy thrusting swords; -160 HP

Relic Description: [Guardian] Improved Mind and Faith, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 6, increases mind by 8 and faith by 17

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Improved Arcane, Reduced Dexterity
Effect: Decreases dexterity by 9, increases arcane by 15
Notes: ~26% increase in status build up, ~ -6% reduction to bow attack

Relic Description: [Ironeye] Improved Vigor and Strength, Reduced Dexterity
Effect: Decreases dexterity by 13, increases strength by 20 and vigor by 5

Relic Description: [Duchess] Improved Vigor and Strength, Reduced Mind
Effect: Decreases mind by 14, increases strength by 24 and vigor by 3

Relic Description: [Duchess] Improved Mind and Faith, Reduced Intelligence
Effect: Decreases intelligence by 5, increases faith by 13 and mind by 3
Notes: +15 FP; 14% increase to incant damage vs base duchess, but still 10% lower than Revenant

Relic Description: [Raider] Improved Mind and Intelligence, Reduced Vigor and Endurance
Effect: Decreases vigor by 8 and endurance by 4, increases intelligence by 35 and mind by 9

Relic Description: [Raider] Improved Arcane, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 4, increases arcane by 17

Relic Description: [Revenant] Improved Vigor and Endurance, Reduced Mind
Effect: Decreases mind by 11, increases vigor by 5 and endurance by 5

Relic Description: [Revenant] Improved Strength, Reduced Faith
Effect: Decreases faith by 6, increases strength by 25

Relic Description: [Recluse] Improved Vigor, Endurance, and Dexterity, Reduced Intelligence and Faith
Effect: Decreases intelligence and faith by 10, increases dexterity by 20, endurance by 5, and vigor by 4

Relic Description: [Recluse] Improved Intelligence and Faith, Reduced Mind
Effect: Decreases mind by 13, increases intelligence and faith by 12

Relic Description: [Executor] Improved Vigor and Endurance, Reduced Arcane
Effect: Decreases arcane by 13, increases vigor by 5 and endurance by 6

Relic Description: [Executor] Improved Dexterity and Arcane, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 7, increases arcane by 9 and dexterity by 12
Notes: -140 HP, ~11% increase in status build up, ~6.3% increase in AP for katana

Relic Description: [Scholar] Improved Mind, Reduced Vigor
Effect: Decreases vigor by 3, increases mind by 9

Relic Description: [Scholar] Improved Endurance and Dexterity, Reduced Intelligence and Arcane
Effect: Decreases intelligence by 4 and arcane by 20, increases endurance by 6 and dexterity by 40

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Improved Dexterity, Reduced Vigor and Faith
Effect: Decreases vigor by 5 and faith by 13, increases dexterity by 19

Relic Description: [Undertaker] Improved Mind and Faith, Reduced Strength
Effect: Decreases strength by 15, increases mind by 9 and faith by 12

Relic Description: Taking Damage Causes [Status] Buildup
Effect: Taking damage inflicts 32 (deathblight) / 40 (madness, sleep) / 44 (bleed, rot, frostbite) / 52 (poison) buildup on the user
Notes: Poison / Rot / Frost does not trigger executor ability Tenacity until the status is recovered

Relic Description: Reduced Strength and Intelligence
Effect: Decreases strength and intelligence by 3

Relic Description: Reduced Dexterity and Faith
Effect: Decreases dexterity and faith by 3

Relic Description: Reduced Dexterity and Intelligence
Effect: Decreases dexterity and intelligence by 3

Relic Description: Reduced Strength and Faith
Effect: Decreases strength and faith by 3

Relic Description: Reduced Vigor and Arcane
Effect: Decreases vigor and arcane by 3

Relic Description: Reduced Rune Acquisition
Effect: Decreases rune gain by 0.9x

Relic Description: Reduced Flask HP Restoration
Effect: Reduces HP gained from flasks by 0.85x

Relic Description: Ultimate Art Charging Impaired
Effect: Decreases ultimate gauge gain by 0.85x
Notes: Unlike Ultimate Art Gauge, affects both passive ult gain and ult gain from attacking

Relic Description: All Resistances Down
Effect: Decreases all status resist by 80

Relic Description: Continuous HP Loss
Effect: Decreases HP by 2/s

Relic Description: More Damage Taken After Evasion
Effect: Decreases damage negations by 45% right after rolling

Relic Description: Repeated Evasions Lower Damage Negation
Effect: Decreases damage negations by 23% / 35% for 15 seconds on repeat rolls

Relic Description: Reduced Damage Negation for Flask Usages
Effect: Decreases damage negations by 45% while using flasks

Relic Description: Lower Attack When Below Max HP
Effect: Decreases damage by 0.915x when HP is below 85%

Relic Description: Poison Buildup When Below Max HP
Effect: Inflicts the user with 2 poison buildup per 0.22s when HP is below 85%
Notes: Does not trigger executor ability Tenacity until the status is recovered

Relic Description: Rot Buildup When Below Max HP
Effect: Inflicts the user with 2 rot buildup per 0.24s when HP is below 85%
Notes: Does not trigger executor ability Tenacity until the status is recovered

Relic Description: Near Death Reduces Max HP
Effect: Reduces maximum HP by 0.75x for 60 seconds after being downed
